description: Try our easy to follow Madagascar Beef Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Madagascar Beef Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cm piece ginger, peeled, finely grated
2 cup medium grain white rice (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Add ginger and garlic. Cook for 2 minutes.

Stir in spices and cook for 1 minute or until aromatic. Add meat and stir to coat. Cook for 10 minutes or until browned. Pour tomato and stock over. Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes. Remove lid and cook for a further 20-30 minutes or until meat is tender. Season with salt and pepper.

Place banana slices into a bowl with lemon juice and toss to coat. Drain off excess juice. Add coconut to a separate bowl with banana. Toss to coat and transfer to a serving bowl. Serve curry with rice. Top with coriander and banana.
